scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run inject_comment && npm run gzip && npm run versionify
scripts.css: mkdir -p build/css/img && cp css/transloadit.css build/css/transloadit2-v3-latest.css && cp -v css/img/* build/css/img/
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run browserify
scripts.inject: cp -v build/css/transloadit2-v3-latest.css ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/content}/css/transloadit2-v3-latest.css && cp -v build/css/img/* ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/content}/css/img/ && cp -v build/jquery.transloadit2-v3*.js* ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/content}/js && cp -v build/jquery.transloadit2-v3-latest.js ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/content}/assets/javascripts/js-untouched/jquery.transloadit2-v3-latest.js
scripts.release: npm version ${SEMANTIC:-patch} -m "Release %s" && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.versionify: cd build && for file in *.*; do cp -v ${file} $(echo ${file} |sed "s/v3-latest/v$(npm run --silent version)/g" ); done
